title: [Muagh River Realty]
description: Ornate rugs cover the polished beech floors.  Six large and glossy wooden desks with luxurious leather consultation chairs stand within individual partitions.  The desks are covered with books listing empty lots as well as completed houses; the individual descriptions sound like promises of the blissful hereafter, with numerous uses of the words "exclusive," "secluded" and "quiet."
